channel.title: Zero's Blade (Made From Scratch!)
channel.description:
[size=24pt]New Release! Name of model: Zero's Blade. Hope you all enjoy! By the way, I rushed through this for fun! NOT MY BEST WORK![/size]
Side Below:
[IMG]http://i1068.photobucket.com/albums/u442/ictbguud/SideOfZerosBlade.jpg[/img]
Side Wire Frame With Model Below:
[IMG]http://i1068.photobucket.com/albums/u442/ictbguud/SideOfZerosBladeWireFrameWithModel.jpg[/img]
Side Wire Frame With No Model Below:
[IMG]http://i1068.photobucket.com/albums/u442/ictbguud/SideOfZerosBladeWireFrame.jpg[/img]
Model In Characters Hand Below:
[IMG]http://i1068.photobucket.com/albums/u442/ictbguud/ZerosBladeInCharactersHand.jpg[/img]
Model In Rendering Below:
[IMG]http://i1068.photobucket.com/albums/u442/ictbguud/ZerosBladeInRendering.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Download Link Below:[/size]
[size=24pt] http://uppit.com/k86o6z46t81q/Zero's_Blade.rar [/size]
[size=36pt]Yes, I know it's big, sorry about that![/size]
Hope you all like it!!!

item.title: Zero's Blade (Made From Scratch!)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Use cylinders for the handles instead. I guess you could use a square, but it just looks odd that large.
